item.title: TROUBLESHOOT (A guide on debugging kubernetes)
item.description: Intro Disclaimer: This post is about Replicated’s Troubleshoot - I work at Replicated. Kubernetes is hard. I thought I understood kubernetes; I had provisioned clusters from scratch, I had installed istio and a whole bunch of other tools, I had fixed outages in the past. I then joined a organisation whose expertise were kubernetes, and oh boy did I have a lot to learn. This isn’t a blog post of what I’ve learned, I think that’s a useless post, it’d be irrelevant in 3 weeks.
